Posts.Content: hi yes thats what it is im on a pity party! thanks for your posting they are great!one day at a time boy my head can sure get into tommarrow!!!!seee you kathy
Posts.Title: New Day, New Attitude

Posts.Content: my dr just released me to go back to work and i'm still fatiged... also i just started deproluprin for fibroids that i'm going to have to have surgery for after a dye x-ray and pre op appt.thats 3 days i have to miss 1/2 a day already....i'm still on morphine for leg pain that stopped on june first.( i am to taper my self off on my own and im down to 30 mg now)..three days before all this cramping and bleeding started that the gyno says is from the fibroids...i've read here where alot of you went to work even during chemo... it helps me to read this, but i just don't feel and haven't been able to be active for an 8 hour day ...why do they have to cut off my sdi and what if i can't pull through a full 40 hour week? i guess all i can do is try.. any input would be appreciated.....thanks everyone.....kathy
Posts.Title: back to work?
